Product Title: X-men: Apocalypse 4K Ultra HD 4K UHD
Review Date: 2016/11/05
Store: James McAvoy  (Actor),     Michael Fassbender  (Actor),     Bryan Singer  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['X-Men: Apocalypse is a 2016 American superhero film based on the fictional X-Men characters that appear in Marvel Comics. It is the ninth installment in the X-Men film series and a sequel to X-Men: Days of Future Past. Directed by Bryan Singer, with a screenplay by Simon Kinberg from a story conceived by Singer, Kinberg, Michael Dougherty and Dan Harris, the film stars an ensemble cast, led by James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Oscar Isaac, Nicholas Hoult, Rose Byrne, Tye Sheridan, Sophie Turner, Olivia Munn and Lucas Till. In X-Men: Apocalypse, the ancient mutant en Sabah Nur awakens in 1983 and plans to wipe out modern civilization and take over the world, leading the X-Men to try to stop him and defeat his team of renegade mutants. ULTRA HD', 'CREDITS:', 'Director: Bryan Singer.', 'Producers: Simon Kinberg, Hutch Parker, Lauren Shuler Donner.', 'Screenplay: Simon Kinberg.', 'Story By: Bryan Singer, Simon Kinberg, Michael Dougherty & Dan Harris.', 'Cast: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence, Oscar Isaac, Nicholas Hoult, Rose Byrne, Tye Sheridan, Sophie Turner, Olivia Munn, Lucas Till, Evan Peters, Kodi Smit-McPhee, Alexandra Shipp, Josh Helman, Lana Condor, Ben Hardy.', 'FEATURES:', 'Format: 4K', 'Format: 4K', 'Language: English (DTS 5.1)', 'Language: English (DTS 5.1)', 'Subtitles: English, French, Spanish', 'Subtitles: English, French, Spanish', 'Dubbed: French, Spanish', 'Dubbed: French, Spanish', 'Region: Region A/1 (Read more about DVD/Blu-ray formats.)', 'Region: Region A/1 (Read more about DVD/Blu-ray formats.)', 'Number of discs: 2', 'Number of discs: 2', 'Rated: PG-13 Parents Strongly Cautioned', 'Rated: PG-13 Parents Strongly Cautioned', 'Run Time: 124 minutes', 'Run Time: 124 minutes', 'X-men: Apocalypse 4K Ultra HD']
Average Rating: 4.5

Inglourious Basterds [Blu-ray] Brad Pitt (Actor), Mike Myers (Actor), Quentin Tarantino (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure ['Brad Pitt takes no prisoners in Quentin Tarantino’s high-octane WWII revenge fantasy Inglourious Basterds. As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as “The Basterds,” is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich. Great movies Minions [Blu-ray] Sandra Bullock (Actor), Jon Hamm (Actor), Kyle Balda (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies ['Product Description', 'The Minions, breakout stars from "Despicable Me," are presented in an origin story that showcases their unpredictable personality and physicality, and pairs them with equally memorable human characters. As it turns out, Minions have existed since the beginning of time. They have evolved from single (yellow) cell organisms into the familiar beings we know, and they live for a collective purpose: to seek out and serve the most despicable master they can find. Academy Award winner Sandra Bullock will lead the voice cast of the human characters as Scarlett Overkill, the world\'s reigning super-villain of the 1960s.', 'Set Contains:', 'Includes Dolby Atmos \uf02d Dolby Atmos is a revolutionary new audio technology that transports you into extraordinary entertainment experience. With Dolby Atmos enabled receivers and speaker configurations, sound comes from all directions, including overhead, to create an immersive experience with clarity, richness, details, and depth. With existing home theater systems, you will get a great surround sound experience.'] {'Genre': 'Illumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion MovieIllumination Entertainment, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Les Mins, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Despicable Me, Comedy, The Minions Picture, Action & Adventure, Minion Movie See more', 'Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Sandra Bullock, Steve Carell, Jon Hamm, Chris Renaud, Hiroyuki Sanada, Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French Canadian (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.03 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35222343', 'Director': 'Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 8, 2015', 'Actors': 'Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud, Steve Carell', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal', 'Number of discs': '2'} Not as funny as I was hoping... profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user maintains a strong interest in action and adventure films, particularly those with high suspense and intense narratives. Their appreciation for science fiction and fantasy continues to evolve, with a focus on contemporary technological themes. They remain cautiously critical of animated family films, emphasizing the quality of humor.

- **Director Affinity:** They favor acclaimed directors such as Quentin Tarantino and Peter Jackson while continuing to explore works by Bryan Singer, showcasing an interest in films that combine dynamic storytelling and engaging characters.

- **Actor Favoritism:** The user enjoys performances from charismatic actors, including Johnny Depp, Paul Bettany, Ian McKellen, and Martin Freeman. Recently, they've shown a growing appreciation for versatile actors, especially those skilled in voice performances.

- **Format Preference:** They prefer high-definition viewing formats, notably Blu-ray and 4K Ultra HD, seeking immersive experiences and superior quality.

- **Technical Awareness:** The user demonstrates technical savvy, honing in on seamless playback and actively investing in advanced technologies for optimal viewing experiences.

- **Critical Acumen:** Their discerning approach to film quality is reinforced by a recent purchase that was well-rated for effects and audio quality, reflecting their ongoing expectation for strong storytelling and performances.

Overall, the user exhibits a sophisticated and evolving taste in cinema, balancing diverse genres with a committed focus on quality and depth.
